org.threadly.test.concurrent

Class TestablePriorityScheduler.OneTimeFutureRunnable<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.test.concurrent.TestablePriorityScheduler.RunnableContainer

        • org.threadly.test.concurrent.TestablePriorityScheduler.OneTimeFutureRunnable<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.util.concurrent.Delayed>, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Delayed, java.util.concurrent.Future<T>, ListenableFuture<T>
    Enclosing class:
    TestablePriorityScheduler

    protected class TestablePriorityScheduler.OneTimeFutureRunnable<T>
extends TestablePriorityScheduler.OneTimeRunnable
implements ListenableFuture<T>
    Container for runnables which are only run once. And also need to implement the ListenableFuture interface.

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately. Listeners from this call will execute on the same thread the result was produced on.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete

      • addListener

        public void addListener(java.lang.Runnable listener,
               java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
        Description copied from interface: ListenableFuture
        Add a listener to be called once the future has completed. If the future has already finished, this will be called immediately.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface ListenableFuture<T>
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to run when the computation is complete
        executor - executor listener should be called on
